decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1418 AC076 Twickenham 01D Rev D, dated 04/02; Planning Statement, undated; - received 25/02/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for non-invasive disability assessments and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the property restored to its former use (Use Class A1) before the expiration of 10 years from the date of this permission or when the use hereby permitted ceases, whichever occurs earliest.
description: Temporary change of use of ground floor to health assessment centre (Use Class D1) for 10 years
